constraints.name: bit_change_count
constraints.description: 位串中相邻位不同的数量必须恰好为 c
constraints.formal: sum(1 for i in range(n-1) if s[i] != s[i+1]) == c

constraints.name: fixed_bits
constraints.description: 某些指定位置的位必须固定为 0，且第一个位不能是 0，最后一个位必须是 0
constraints.formal: s[0] == '1' and s[n-1] == '0' and all(s[z_i-1] == '0' for z_i in broken_bits)
